DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity V419 Given Concomitantly With Prevnar 13™ RotaTeq™ ( V419-005 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Participant healthy infant Participant receive one dose monovalent hepatitis B vaccine prior 1 month age Exclusion Criteria : Participant receive one dose monovalent hepatitis B vaccine hepatitis B base combination vaccine prior study entry Participant vaccinate acellular pertussis whole cell pertussis base combination vaccine , haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate , poliovirus , pneumococcal conjugate pneumococcal polysaccharide , rotavirus , combination Participant fever ≥38.0°C ( ≥110.4°F ) within 24 hour study enrollment Participant vaccinate nonstudy vaccine ( i.e. , inactivate , conjugate , live virus vaccine ) within 30 day prior study enrollment , except inactivate influenza vaccine permit 15 day prior enrollment Participant hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) seropositivity ( medical history ) Participant history haemophilus influenzae type B , hepatitis B , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , poliomyelitis , rotavirus , pneumococcal infection
